message.name: ERR_CONTRACTPRODUCTLINK_FV_PRODUCTIDLINKLIST_EMPTY
message.locale: You must select a Product for the contract

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTPRODUCTLINK_FV_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: You must enter a type for the contract.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTPRODUCTLINK_FV_PRODUCT_DUPLICATED
message.locale: The same product cannot be added more than once.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTLINK_XRV_START_CONCERN_START
message.locale: The contract's start cannot be before the provider's start date.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTLINK_XRV_END_CONCERN_END
message.locale: The contract's end cannot be after the provider's end date.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTLINK_XRV_START_CONCERN_END
message.locale: The contract's start cannot be after the provider's end date.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTLINK_XRV_START_PROVISION_START
message.locale: The contract's start cannot be earlier than the earliest provision's start date.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTLINK_XRV_END_PROVISION_END
message.locale: The contract's end cannot be later than the latest provision's end date.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTLINK_FV_CANCELLED
message.locale: The contract is already canceled and cannot be modified
The contract is already cancelled and cannot be modified

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTSERVICELINK_FV_SERVICE_DUPLICATED
message.locale: The same service cannot be added more than once.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTSERVICELINK_FV_CONCERNROLEID_EMPTY
message.locale: Concern Role ID must not be blank.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTSERVICELINK_FV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: Name must not be blank.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTSERVICELINK_FV_SERVICEIDLINKLIST_EMPTY
message.locale: You must select a Service for the contract

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTSERVICELINK_XFV_EFFEND_EFFSTART
message.locale: Effective To Date must not be earlier than Effective From Date.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTSERVICELINK_XFV_EFFSTARTDATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Effective From Date must not be blank.

message.name: INF_CONTRACT_XRV_PRODUCTPROV_EMPTY
message.locale: There are no products available for this provider.

message.name: INF_CONTRACT_XRV_SERVICESUPP_EMPTY
message.locale: There are no services available for this supplier.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTPRODUCTLINK_RV_PRODUCTPROVIDER_RNFE
message.locale: Product provider not registered.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTPRODUCT_FV_PRODUCT_EMPTY
message.locale: You must have at least one product associated with a Contract.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTSERVICE_FV_SERVICE_EMPTY
message.locale: You must have at least one service associated with a Contract.

message.name: ERR_FV_CONTRACT_ADDPRODUCT_STATUS
message.locale: You cannot add products to this contract as it has been canceled
You cannot add products to this contract as it has been cancelled

message.name: ERR_FV_PRODUCT_REMOVEPRODUCT_STATUS
message.locale: You cannot remove products from this contract as it has been canceled
You cannot remove products from this contract as it has been cancelled

message.name: ERR_FV_PRODUCT_ADDSERVICE_STATUS
message.locale: You cannot add services to this contract as it has been canceled
You cannot add services to this contract as it has been cancelled

message.name: ERR_FV_PRODUCT_REMOVESERVICE_STATUS
message.locale: You cannot remove services from this contract as it has been canceled
You cannot remove services from this contract as it has been cancelled

message.name: ERR_RENEWAL_LEAD_DAYS_LESS_THAN_ZERO
message.locale: Renewal Lead Days field value cannot be less than zero.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACT_SUMMARY_TEXT
message.locale: The value entered for Summary field is too long %1n - maximum allowed is %2n.
